articles.author: Kumar
articles.title: Musk's X Raises Concern Over India Court Order.. - Great Andhra
articles.description: Elon Musk’s social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, has expressed concern over the Karnataka High Court’s recent decision on its plea.
articles.content:
Elon Musk’s social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, has expressed concern over the Karnataka High Court’s recent decision on its plea.
